text: The Counselor is a 2013 British-American crime drama thriller movie. It is about human nature, greed and death. Pen√©lope Cruz plays Laura, Cameron Diaz plays Malkina and Rosie Perez plays Ruth. The movie got mixed reviews by the critics. It got back close to $47 million, $22 million past its budget. This movie, however, was considered a flop. It was released in October and November 2013.
